text:
Kritika Sharma is an Indian model and actress.
She began her acting career with Colors TV's Soap opera Jai Shri Krishna. She portrayed role of Radha. She also was on Ekta Kapoor's show Tere Liye as Young Mouli.
She was in the bollywood movie Dark Rainbow as Wendy. She also played Kinjal Singh Veghela in Roop - Mard Ka Naya Swaroop.Simple English Wikipedia
